comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Mr Samuel J. Hood,  you are making me giddy!  I could never climb a mast and wonder how the sailors did it in rolling seas.

comment.author: 55198937@N05
comment._content: Sam Hood certainly earned his reputation.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/angeljim46] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Crazy! Something we've always wondered too. Choppy seas and climbing the mast = worst nightmare.
